title: All-Party Parliamentary Group for Acquired Brain Injury
purpose: To raise awareness of Acquired Brain Injury (ABI) and seek improvements in support and services for people with ABI and their carers; to provide a voice for people with ABI in parliament; and to raise issues across health, social care and welfare which affect people living with ABI.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 020 7219 1389.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Chloe Hayward, UK Acquired Brain Injury Forum. Tel: 0345 608 0788
contact_details.secretariat: UK Acquired Brain Injury Forum acts as the group's secretariat.http://ukabif.org.uk/
